title: Rihanna and ex Drake reunite at the Canadian rapper's birthday party
text:
In 2018, she famously told Vogue of her rumored on-off lover, 'We don’t have a friendship now, but we’re not enemies either. It is what it is.'

But Rihanna and Drake seem to have at least returned to the friendzone, based on reports from the Canadian rapper's birthday party on Monday night, at which the Barbadian songstress was a guest.

The pair, 'looked like they were having fun together as friends' in West Hollywood's Poppy nightclub, according to an E!News source.

The good place: Rihanna [L, earlier this month] and Drake [seen here Tuesday] seem to have at least returned to the friendzone, based on reports from the Canadian rapper's birthday party on Monday night, at which the Barbadian songstress was a guest

Rihanna, 31, shimmered as she entered the LA hotspot wearing a glittering gold skirt, paired with a wide-neck tan sweater which exposed the beauty's shoulders, as well as having a plunging neckline which gave just a hint of her cleavage.

On her feet, the Umbrella hitmaker wore a pair of tan heels, while oversize diamond encrusted hoop earring hung from her lobes.

The songstress -whose birth name is Robyn Rihanna Fenty-wore her curly raven tresses pulled back in a tight pony tail for the outing.

Twin diamonds: The pair, 'looked like they were having fun together as friends' in West Hollywood's Poppy nightclub, according to an E!News source. Social media from the party seen here, with Rihanna [R] joined by Love & Hip Hop star Lyrica Anderson

Classy: Drake had McDonalds delivered to the club to serve to his guests

Long time love: At the 2016 VMAs, Drake famously declared his love for the Diamonds songstress, saying 'She's someone I've been in love with since I was 22-years-old'. Seen together in 2011

Meanwhile, Drake, 32, rocked his trademark black turtleneck for the evening. worn with dark trousers and black leather shoes.

Over the turtleneck hung a prominent, diamond-encrusted necklace.

Upon arrival, Rihanna 'was escorted to Drake's table by security,' per E!News sources.

'Her and Drake were talking for a while and were smiling and laughing. It seemed like a very pleasant interaction,' the news site quoted them as saying.

The scene of the crime: Drake returned to Poppy the next night too. He's seen here dressed little more casually for this evening out in WeHo

The bling ring: A close-up of Drake's personally made Raptors championship ring

However the duo have had their ups and down over the years.

At the 2016 VMAs, Drake famously declared his love for the Diamonds songstress, saying 'She's someone I've been in love with since I was 22-years-old'

'She's one of my best friends in the world. All my adult life, I've looked up to her, even though she's younger than me.'

The pair were reported dating for a time, with The Mirror reporting the pair were seen holding hands in London back in 2014.

However, by 2018, Rihanna confirmed they weren't even friends, describing their relationship as 'it is what it is.'
